name: Witch Way to the Graveyard?
author: Bridget Spalding
description: Join a clumsy witch on a comedic journey as she tries to find the right graveyard for a special ritual.

name: Ghoul Talk: Conversations with the Undead
author: Lynn Whitman
description: An investigative reporter ventures into haunted locations to interview the undead and learns their untold stories.

name: Boo-oographies: Famous Ghosts Throughout History
author: Spencer Redwood
description: Dive into the histories of famous apparitions from around the world, and discover their contributions to ghostly lore.

name: Fright Bites: A Cookbook for Goblins
author: Erica Collins
description: From bat wing pastries to spider stew, discover ghoulishly delightful recipes perfect for any Halloween feast.

name: The Mummy Returns... His Library Books
author: Raphael Walters
description: A humorous tale of an ancient mummy who awakens in the modern world and discovers the perils of overdue library books.

name: The Vampire's Toothpick: Dental Dilemmas of the Undead
author: Tasha Bright
description: When a vampire's fang breaks, he embarks on a quest for dental repair, leading to unexpected adventures.

name: Zombie Zumba: Keeping Fit in the Afterlife
author: Dale Sherwood
description: Zombies need exercise too! This guide showcases undead-friendly fitness routines, perfect for staying limber in the afterlife.

name: Howl-O-Ween: Tales of Werewolf Woes
author: Luna Richardson
description: Experience the daily struggles of werewolves trying to celebrate Halloween without giving away their true nature.

name: Frankenstein's Flaws: DIY Monster Mistakes
author: Bonnie Steward
description: A DIY guide gone wrong! Discover the hilarious pitfalls of creating life, told from the monster's perspective.

name: Skeletons in the Closet: A Guide to Tidy Tomb Keeping
author: Marie Holloway
description: Unearth the secrets of keeping tombs neat and tidy with practical advice from a very organized skeleton.

name: Phantom Photobomb: Haunting the Camera
author: Casper Clarkson
description: Follow a playful phantom who loves to appear in people's photos, leading to eerie yet comical results.

name: Warts and All: The Witch's Beauty Guide
author: Helena Cosgrove
description: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder! Learn about the unique beauty standards and practices of witches.
